item.title: By: josephscott
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2019/07/30/chrome-release-schedule/#comment-166505">Jonathan McNamara</a>.
Having that in Google Calendar would be helpful. Unfortunately I haven't seen an option for that.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Jonathan McNamara.

Having that in Google Calendar would be helpful. Unfortunately I haven’t seen an option for that.

item.title: By: Jonathan McNamara
item.dc:creator: Jonathan McNamara
item.description: Do you know of a way to get this in a calendar that you could add to google calendar to be able to quickly see when they are pushing the next change out to the wild?
item.content:encoded: Do you know of a way to get this in a calendar that you could add to google calendar to be able to quickly see when they are pushing the next change out to the wild?
